attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Olympics should be, among other things, a time of national pride and a platform to showcase what this country has to offer.

The 2012 logo as launched today (June 4th 2007) is something to be embarrassed about, not proud, and at a cost of £400,000!

I urge the government/2012 olympics committee to scrap the logo.
If you really want to get British youth involved, why not invite school children to design one as part of a competition across the U.K.?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
